mapper.select: SELECT t.team_post_code, t.team_post_title, t.team_content, t.team_create_date, t.team_update_date, t.team_deadline, t.team_del_status, u.user_code as "user.user_code", u.user_nick as "user.user_nick" FROM team_post t JOIN user u ON ( t.user_code = u.user_code ) WHERE t.team_post_code = #{teamPostCode}

SELECT t.team_post_code, t.team_post_title, t.team_create_date, t.team_deadline, u.user_code as "user.user_code", u.user_nick as "user.user_nick" FROM team_post t JOIN user u ON ( t.user_code = u.user_code ) ORDER BY t.team_create_date DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}
